references.paper_title: Accurate structure prediction of biomolecular interactions with alphafold 3.
references.reason: This paper introduces AlphaFold3, a highly accurate protein structure prediction model that is used as a baseline in the current paper for comparison.

references.paper_title: Accurate prediction of nucleic acid and protein-nucleic acid complexes using rosettafoldna.
references.reason: This paper introduces RoseTTAFoldNA, a model for predicting protein-nucleic acid complexes, which is used as a strong baseline for comparison in the experimental results.
This paper introduces layer normalization, a crucial technique for stabilizing the training of deep neural networks, which is used in the proposed FAFormer architecture.
This foundational paper introduces the Transformer architecture, which is the basis for the FAFormer model and is heavily referenced in the related work section.

references.paper_title: Geometric deep learning: Grids, groups, graphs, geodesics, and gauges.
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of geometric deep learning, which forms the theoretical foundation for many of the equivariant models used for comparison in this work.
